On Premise
components.custom:
var preset = {
  plan: 'enterprise',
  projects: null,
  tenants: 0,
  stages: 10,
  emails: null,
  forms: null,
  formRequests: null,
  formManagers: 0,
  submissionRequests: null,
  pdfs: null,
  pdfDownloads: null,
  pdfServers: 3,
  apiServers: 3,
}

try {
  var instances = form.flattenComponents()

  _.each(preset, function(value, key) {
    if (!instances[key]) {
      throw new Error('Invalid key: ' + key)
    }

    if (value === null) {
      instances[key].dataValue = null
      instances[key].setValueAt(0, null)
      instances[key].resetValue()
    }

    instances[key].setValue(value)
  })
  
  instances.scope.setValue([
      'apiServer',
      'pdfServer',
      'project',
      'tenant',
      'stage',
      'form',
      'formRequest',
      'formManager',
      'email',
      'pdf',
      'pdfDownload',
      'submissionRequest',
    ])
}
catch (e) {
  debugger
  alert('Error applying preset: ' + e.toString())
}
